title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: Several stories of crime in Los Angeles interweave in Tarantino's nonlinear narrative, blending violence and dark humor.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to create chaos across Gotham City.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy household by infiltrating their household and taking over their lives.

title: Spirited Away
description: A young girl enters a world of spirits and must find a way to free herself and her parents.

title: Casablanca
description: Set during WWII, an American expatriate must choose between love and helping his former lover's husband escape from Casablanca.

title: Schindler's List
description: The true story of Oskar Schindler, who saved over a thousand Jewish refugees during the Holocaust by employing them in his factories.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: La La Land
description: A jazz pianist and an aspiring actress pursue their dreams in Los Angeles while facing romantic and professional challenges.

title: Titanic
description: A young couple from different social classes fall in love aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A meek Hobbit and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy a powerful ring and save Middle-earth.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The life story of Forrest Gump, a man with low IQ but good intentions, who witnesses and influences several historical events.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet must meet with an incarcerated cannibalistic serial killer to catch another serial killer.

title: Gladiator
description: A Roman general seeks vengeance after being betrayed and reduced to slavery, becoming a gladiator.

title: The Social Network
description: The founding of Facebook and the resulting lawsuits and personal conflicts among its creators.

title: Am√©lie
description: A shy waitress decides to change the lives of those around her for the better while grappling with her own isolation.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: The adventures of a legendary concierge and his lobby boy at a famous European hotel between the wars.
